creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: two crescent shaped forms with abstract, forked and zigzagging forms across upper portion of image; in browns and oranges; in lower portion, same abstract shape is echoed vertically in silver pigment, and horizontally in UR; faint silver border
inscription: Bottom, in pencil: [From the Star, Day] [15/18] [Toshi Yoshida 1957]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: From the Star, Day
